summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the acquisition from The Uplands, Inc., of all its underground system, facilities and equipment for the distribution of electric energy located in the City of Seattle; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; and providing for the issuance of a warrant on the Light Fund in payment therefor.
